entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:56 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 03:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 9.0°C
Wind: SSW 24 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 10 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to 10 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
